query:
UPDATE games
        SET complete = true
        WHERE system_id = ?
        AND complete = false
        AND jbfolder = true
        AND NOT EXISTS (
            SELECT r.id
            FROM roms r
            WHERE r.game_id = games.id
            AND r.romfile_id IS NULL
            AND r.parent_id IS NOT NULL
            AND r.name NOT LIKE 'PS3_CONTENT/%'
            AND r.name NOT LIKE 'PS3_EXTRA/%'
            AND r.name NOT LIKE 'PS3_UPDATE/%'
        )
